# Bracket Notation Mapping for Syntax Tree Diagrams
# Format: filename | bracket_notation
# Generated for use with SyntaxTreeHybrid tool
# Labels: S, IC, DC, RC, CC (clauses); NP, VP, PP, ADJP, ADVP (phrases)
# POS tags: N, V, ADJ, ADV, DET, PRON, PREP, CONJ, MOD, AUX, SUB, REL, COMP
# RULE: Every N, V, ADJ, ADV, PREP must be under its own phrase (NP, VP, ADJP, ADVP, PP)

# Chapter 5 - Open Classes (Phrases and Word Classes)
# Noun Phrases
ch05_np_simple | [NP [DET the] [ADJP [ADJ tall]] [N student]]
ch05_np_with_pp | [NP [DET the] [ADJP [ADJ tall]] [N student] [PP [PREP from] [NP [N Ohio]]]]
ch05_np_complex | [NP [DET the] [ADJP [ADJ brilliant]] [ADJP [ADJ young]] [N student] [PP [PREP from] [NP [N Ohio]]]]
# Verb Phrases
ch05_vp_intransitive | [VP [V slept]]
ch05_vp_transitive | [VP [V read] [NP [DET the] [N book]]]
ch05_vp_ditransitive | [VP [V gave] [NP [PRON her]] [NP [DET a] [N present]]]
# Adjective Phrases
ch05_adjp_simple | [ADJP [ADJ happy]]
ch05_adjp_degree | [ADJP [ADVP [ADV very]] [ADJ happy]]
ch05_adjp_complex | [ADJP [ADVP [ADV very]] [ADJ proud] [PP [PREP of] [NP [DET her] [N work]]]]
# Adverb Phrases
ch05_advp_simple | [ADVP [ADV quickly]]
ch05_advp_degree | [ADVP [ADVP [ADV very]] [ADV quickly]]

# Chapter 6 - Sentence Structures and Patterns (also Closed Classes)

# New for Diagram Examples section
ch09_coordination | [S [S [NP [PRON I]] [VP [V laugh]]] [CONJ and] [S [NP [PRON you]] [VP [V cry]]]]

ch09_subord_dc_first | [S [DC [SUB Because] [NP [PRON you]] [VP [V cry]]] [IC [NP [PRON I]] [VP [V laugh]]]]

ch13_that_clause_object | [S [NP [PRON I]] [VP [V know] [CC [COMP that] [NP [PRON you]] [VP [V cry]]]]]

# Chapter 14 - Adjectivals (Relative Clauses, Participial Phrases)
ch14_participle_present | [S [NP [DET the] [VP [V running]] [N dog]] [VP [V barks]]]
ch14_participle_past | [S [NP [DET the] [VP [V frightened]] [N dog]] [VP [V barks]]]
ch14_relcl_who_subject | [S [NP [DET the] [N dog] [RC [REL who] [VP [V barks]]]] [VP [V sleeps]]]
ch14_relcl_that_object | [S [NP [DET the] [N dog] [RC [REL that] [NP [PRON I]] [VP [V saw]]]] [VP [V sleeps]]]
ch14_relcl_where | [S [NP [PRON I]] [VP [V saw] [NP [DET the] [N place] [RC [REL where] [NP [PRON you]] [VP [V live]]]]]]
ch14_relcl_empty | [S [NP [DET the] [N dog] [RC [REL _] [NP [PRON I]] [VP [V saw]]]] [VP [V sleeps]]]

# Chapter 16 - Voice and Auxiliaries
ch16_passive_by | [VP [AUX was] [V written] [PP [PREP by] [NP [N Maria]]]]
